name: Escape From The Pit
description:
After being sent to prison for a series of mass murders he definitely committed Josh Smith has only served three years of his life sentence.

But suddenly a golden opportunity to escape is presented to him as the organisation True justice made a mistake and opened his cell and gave him a gun instead of the cell next to him which housed John Smith, a man who had been wrongly sent to prison for a crime he didn’t commit.

Now with the perfect opportunity to escape Josh will fight his way out of this pit of a prison.
